channel.title: Is sillyboysoft
channel.description: a good mod? Whats your opinions?

item.title: Is sillyboysoft
item.dc:creator: @Sean Sean
item.description:
@Sean wrote:

I had no say in the name for the bot tbh - it was already decided upon before I even knew about it. The two responsible for the name are regex and exemplar. Tbh I couldnt of cared less what they called it, I was never any good at naming bots myself.

Read full topic

item.title: Is sillyboysoft
item.dc:creator: @VG_Kobra VG_Kobra
item.description:
@VG_Kobra wrote:

[quote=“Sean, post:42, topic:8388”]Its really hard to pretend to be a nazi - “FUCK JEWS” “ZIEG HIEL” “POWER TO THE ARYAN NATION” – yeah throw in the occasional “fuck blacks” and you are there. Why a nazi? because people claimed we were nazis (the aryan team) just because of the name (which I had nothing to do with btw).

And I have to say, I found the whole thing very amusing. My initial concern wasnt for the mods to recognise the error of their ways, it was because it made me laugh.

Alot of free time? nah, it didnt take much time at all.[/quote]

Frankly if your going to put Aryan as your name of the bot you had better have the capacity to handle the fact that people think you are Nazis, only some educated people would know that it is simply to declare the superiority of the bot.

Educated people in Kaitnieks = Minority.

Read full topic

domain names? Dont belong to me. And the pictures? Aquired via a quick google image search. “dead nigger” “hanging nigger” “nazi party” “neo nazi” “sieg hiel”.

item.title: Is sillyboysoft
item.dc:creator: @VG_Kobra VG_Kobra
item.description:
@VG_Kobra wrote:

[quote=“Sean, post:39, topic:8388”]I wasnt actually offended by you at all, I was just bored. I would of banned me for posting those pictures regardless of the rules (I mean I got to the stage where I was posting old pictures of dead bodies and STILL getting away with it?).

But at any rate, the main reason I did all of this spamming / flamming / critizism was to see how far I could go before getting banned (which I never was). I do believe this community isnt run properly and the rules arent enforced as they should be, with certain people being allowed to blatantly disregard the rules. (Regex did this for a LONG time before being banned)

If you do not enforce the rules for every single person, the rules will be ignored. Why follow the rules if no one else is? Not to mention that the rules arent set in stone. A moderator is a person who has been appointed due to their character, a certain amount of trust should be put in them to dictate what is suitable and what is not. Does the rules say I cant post a picture of a dead body? I guess I can do it – the moderators should make their own decision there to say it should NOT be allowed.

So to clairfy, I am not actually a neo nazi, I dont agree with hitler, I dont hate jews (oh and I dont hate you).

I do hope that this forum does go in a new direction, thou I do somewhat doubt it. Bad habbits are bad to break and it would require alot of effort from the administration team and to change the attitude of the users of this forum. It is possible thou.

Either way, this is my constructive criticism ignore it or not I dont care.[/quote]

You must have a lot of free time to make us belive you are a determined Jew Hating Nazi only too tell us you weren’t and only did it to show the exploitation of the rules…

But you were VERY convincing

Read full topic

@Sean wrote:

I wasnt actually offended by you at all, I was just bored. I would of banned me for posting those pictures regardless of the rules (I mean I got to the stage where I was posting old pictures of dead bodies and STILL getting away with it?).

But at any rate, the main reason I did all of this spamming / flamming / critizism was to see how far I could go before getting banned (which I never was). I do believe this community isnt run properly and the rules arent enforced as they should be, with certain people being allowed to blatantly disregard the rules. (Regex did this for a LONG time before being banned)

If you do not enforce the rules for every single person, the rules will be ignored. Why follow the rules if no one else is? Not to mention that the rules arent set in stone. A moderator is a person who has been appointed due to their character, a certain amount of trust should be put in them to dictate what is suitable and what is not. Does the rules say I cant post a picture of a dead body? I guess I can do it – the moderators should make their own decision there to say it should NOT be allowed.

item.title: Is sillyboysoft
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

sorry sean the rules have been rewritten and i wont delete the pictures if they are anyway constructive, however in the past they where not if you are offended by my action take it up with me personally next time instead of starting slander please, as for your feelings that ive targeted your posts i don’t believe ive been any harsher with you than others i felt strongly against the neo nazi shit you guys where posting and deleted just about all of the ones i saw, yes i made a mistake in doing so and it wont happen again unless the new rules are broken on images, however this crap about me taking away the freedom of speech is laughable seeming as the internet is lawless to an extent, that dosnt mean you cant create your own laws.

Read full topic

item.title: Is sillyboysoft
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Sean, post:33, topic:8388”]it was 2 pictures, now a page, and they were my brethren showing support in the post and it did contain text. And also the text she replaced it with was dispicable, surely if the post wasnt warrented it would of been better to delete it?

And yeah, if she is good at keeping the private server sections clean as a whistle, why is she allowed to foul up the other sections… or is there something else she keeps polished that you want to tell us about mopar? (props to exemplar for the idea for the joke – he just lacked the backbone to post it).[/quote]

[quote=“moparisthebest, post:10, topic:8596”]This is how it is going to work:

  1. I dont care what the picture is, if it is an offtopic picture in a post with no text or spam text, its getting deleted. Period.
  2. If the picture contains images of people being hung, dead people, or pornography, it is getting removed because of the children that browse these forums.

Other than those two, plus common sense, you can post any pictures you want, just dont spam them.[/quote]

I dont know what text your post had in it, the above post is the new rule regarding pictures.

and why is she a g-mod over all boards? I dont know how much clearer I can be, she was the server dev board mod for longer than she has been a g-mod, it was quite a few months, so when we needed more moderators obviously she was the top choice, so she was given the position.

About the last comment Sean, real original, havent heard that one before :rolleyes: :P, all I am going to say to that is she lives in florida, I live in ohio, if your not familiar with the geography of the USA that is about a straight 24 hour drive @ 65mph

Read full topic
